data.title: Great place for meat, fish, and deli
data.text: Always enjoy Fligners for special attention and fine selection of any type of fresh fish, meat, and poultry.  Also love their wide variety of items at the deli counter including many types of in house smoked varieties. And their in store bakery always has very tasty treats !!

data.title: Amazing experience.
data.text: I never saw such a large meat counter, and the portions of two chicken breast made two meals for my husband and I. There is also a large variety of home made meals ready for on the go.

data.title: Great
data.text: A traditional home style grocery. The guys even carry your groceries out to your car! The meat is fresh & local--great variety--knowledgeable butchers!

data.title: Good place for fresh meat
data.text: Great  prices on fresh cut meat. Lady at counter helped me choose  the best  option  for  steaks. Great  selection of fresh cut meats too.

data.title: meat...meat...meat
data.text: all meat purchased here has been exceptional..steaks..chicken...sausage   also vegetables have been very inexpensive and very good...I usually buy the chicken breasts by the 40 pound box....excellent...

data.title: Nothing special.
data.text: Large grocery store. Nothing special. Was rated high for things to do but I wouldn't travel to go see.

data.title: Great place for local produce and meat - GREAT PRICES!
data.text: I go to Fligner's for all of my produce and meat!  Everything is fresh and from local farmers.  Their beef comes from my parent's neighbors, so we see the beef being raised.  And the prices are usually phenomenal, especially for such great quality.  The people are also always so nice!  I have never had a bad experience at Fligner's.

data.title: Great Meat Dept.
data.text: Excellent custom cuts.  Awesome meat sales!  You do have to buy in quantity to get the best price.  Nice counter meatcutters they listen and give good advice.  Fligner smokies are the best!!!

data.title: You can find everything here
data.text: Fresh produce, great meat counter, homemade sausage, very good bakery items, large Hispanic section, friendly staff who will go out of their way to order something if they don't have it and you want it. Old fashioned customer service, bag boys who help you to your car, there jusr isn't anything about Fligner's not to like, except that sometimes it's very busy!

data.title: Fresh fruit and vegetables and meatmarket all in one place.
data.text: Fligners has been around as long as I can remember.  I believe it's the only market around where the baggers walk you to your care and put your groceries in your car for you. Good ole-fashion customer service.

data.title: Local grocery store, quality foods
data.text: Need some grilling meat for the summer season, this is the place.  Ribs, steaks and so on.  All the sides, vegetables and fruits too.

data.title: lunch review
data.text: food is usually pretty good.  convenient if working in the area.  usually not too busy.  I get lunch here usually twice a week, depending on the menu.

data.title: Fligner's Market
data.text: My comment to all our family and friends  is, "You can't go wrong with Fligner's!!" The food is wonderful!

data.title: Fresh Meats
data.text:
We go for the bone in chicken breasts for the grill, baking or soup. The meat department staff are very knowledgeable and very helpful & always have a smile, no matter how busy they get. Believe me, they get BUSY!!!
They have great deals on eggs and other dairy products. The deli staff will give you  a taste if you are not sure about trying something new, lunch meat or cheeses.
A best hidden jewel in Lorain.

data.title: Good customer service
data.text:
Excellent service provided. Produce very good prices. Butcher counter, good choices and cut to order.
Good prices

data.title: best place ever for food and catering
data.text: they have the best quality food and wonderful for catering.  You can buy single items or bulk.  they often have on site already prepared meals

data.title: Quality is great
data.text: Fresh meats,no additives in the taste,will fill any size, quanity of your order,always fresh quality is great

data.title: Neighborhood grocery with local flavor
data.text: This store is a real gem in the heart of downtown Lorain.  Has a wonderful meat department, bakery and excellent produce department. Get the personal attention without the big chain indifference.  This store is well known for it's high quality meats and lives up to it's reputation.  Worth a trip to try it out.  I shop there all the time.  Great staff with assistance to your car with every visit.  Love it!!

data.title: Old-school charm.
data.text: Back in the 50s in the 60s when we wanted specialty meats we had neighborhood meat markets grocery store. Fligners is that type of market.  It has the best tasting meet around. You can buy in any quantity you mean from sample to banquet. Fligners also will do your lunches or parties weddings which we have use them for that also .  We are very fortunate to have had this market in our city for as long as I can remember. Family owned and very friendly and those who work there are friendly also. And the store is clean and roomy to shop  I highly recommend the store.

data.title: Good food, not great prices.
data.text: The fresh bread is the best in town. The fresh meats are great and priced good, but almost everything else is well over priced.
